# Hyperliquid API Documentation

> 58 documentation files | ~31k tokens

## General Documentation

- [Authentication](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/hyperliquid/authentication.md): It is recommended to use an existing SDK instead of manually generating
- [Change Log](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/hyperliquid/change_log.md): For the latest changes and updates to the Hyperliquid API, please refer to the
- [Error Codes](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/hyperliquid/error_codes.md): https://hyperliquid.gitbook.io/hyperliquid-docs/for-developers/api/error-responses
- [Network Connectivity](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/hyperliquid/network_connectivity.md): Hyperliquid API provides public REST and WebSocket endpoints for trading and
- [Rate Limits](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/hyperliquid/rate_limits.md): The following rate limits apply per IP address:
- [Response Formats](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/hyperliquid/response_formats.md): https://hyperliquid.gitbook.io/hyperliquid-docs/for-developers/api/notation

## Public Endpoints

- [POST Candle Snapshot](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/hyperliquid/endpoints/public/candle_snapshot.md)
- [POST Check Builder Fee Approval](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/hyperliquid/endpoints/public/check_builder_fee_approval.md)
- [POST L2 Book Snapshot](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/hyperliquid/endpoints/public/l2_book_snapshot.md)
- [POST Query Aligned Quote Token Status](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/hyperliquid/endpoints/public/query_aligned_quote_token_status.md)
- [POST Retrieve Details For A Vault](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/hyperliquid/endpoints/public/retrieve_details_for_a_vault.md)
- [POST Retrieve Mids For All Coins](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/hyperliquid/endpoints/public/retrieve_mids_for_all_coins.md)
- [Websocket Api](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/hyperliquid/endpoints/public/websocket_api.md)
